UPDATE T_STUDENTS SET FIRST_NAME = :FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME = :LAST_NAME, GENDER=:GENDER, GRADE = :GRADE, EMAIL = :EMAIL, ROLL_NO = :ROLL_NO WHERE STUDENT_ID = :STUDENT_ID
UPDATE students SET vaccinated_status = :vaccinatedStatus, vaccination_date = :vaccinationDate WHERE student_id = :studentId

INSERT INTO vaccination_drives (vaccine_name, drive_date, start_date, end_date, available_doses, grade_eligibility) VALUES (:vaccineName, :driveDate, :startDate, :endDate, :availableDoses, :gradeEligibility)
INSERT INTO vaccination_records (student_id, drive_id, vaccine_name, vaccination_date, dose_number, status) VALUES (:studentId, :driveId, :vaccineName, :vaccinationDate, :doseNumber, :status)
